title: [$250] Debug - After adding expense to the report type changes from expense to chat for both

labels.name: External

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.63-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Y **Reproducible in production?:** Unable to validate in Prod **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from TestRail:** https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/73748 **Issue reported by:** Applause - Internal Team ## Action Performed: 1. Sign in to ND 2. Create a manual expense in the workspace chat 2. Enable Debug mode 3. Open expense details, click the header, then Debug 4. Scroll down to the constant fields, observe the "type" row - it shows "expense" 5. Add a distance expense to the report 6. Repeat steps 3-4 with any expense in the report - type row shows "chat" now ## Expected Result: "type" row shows "expense" for the expenses in the report ## Actual Result: "type" row shows "chat" for the expenses in the report, when there are more than one expense ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop

Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/home 2. Go to Reports 3. Enter status: 4. Note suggestions shows status: (shown incorrectly) 5. Tap on it 6. Note no response as it musnt be shown in suggestions 7. Enter has: or group-by: 8. Note suggestions doesn't show has: or group-by: ## Expected Result: Suggestions after typing status: should show only valid status values like status:approved, status:withdrawn status: itself must not appear in suggestions like it doesn't show for has: and group-by: ## Actual Result: After typing status:, suggestions incorrectly include status: itself Tapping status: gives no response ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop

Open app 2. Navigate to any chat 3. Perform swipe-back gesture ## Expected Result: When performing the swipe-back gesture in Safari on iPhone, the previous screen should not appear. If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.62-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/13176725/test-cases/41237073 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** N/A **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** iPhone 15 iOS 26.1 **App Component:** Money Requests ## Action Performed: Preconditions: User A and User B have a chat 1. Log in as User A on iOS 2. Make sure there is no unread messages in the chat with User B, navigate away from the chat 2. As User B on secondary device create a distance expense in 1:1 chat with User A 3. As User A, open the chat with User B, tap the expense preview ## Expected Result: "New message" and "Latest messages" buttons do not appear in the distance expense details for the receiver ## Actual Result: "New message" green button appears at the top of the expense details page, then changes to grey "Latest messages", then disappears ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [ ] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/af84c75a-1bed-4e7b-bbe8-365a5078a713 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
